name: meteor-images
description: generate icons and splash screens for a meteor project

scripts.test: npm run _test_helpers && npm run _test_code_gen && npm run _test_sizes && npm run _test_image_gen
scripts._test_helpers: npm run _test_idx_translator && npm run _test_path_join && npm run _test_exec_question
scripts._test_image_gen: npm run _test_gen_0 && npm run _test_gen_1 && npm run _test_gen_2
scripts.try_out_icons: npm run _sample_icon && node index.js images icons && node index.js code icons
scripts.try_out_splash: npm run _sample_splash && node index.js images launchScreens && node index.js code launchScreens

author: anonymous
